original_text: Remember that you were slaves in Egypt and the Lord your God rescued you from there. That is why I am commanding you to do these things.
korean_text: 너는 애굽에서 종 되었던 일과 네 하나님 여호와께서 너를 거기서 속량하신 것을 기억하라 이러므로 내가 네게 이 일을 행하라 명령하노라

sentences.original_text: Remember that you were slaves in Egypt
and the Lord your God rescued you from there
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희 하나님 여호와께서 너희를 그곳에서 구출하셨다

sentences.original_text: That is why I am commanding you
